You can also click the Finance Option to do a remote finance application and get pre-approved on the vehicle of your choice. This is a Fantastic Sports Sedan, fast and extremely economical. Very clean and mechanically sound with service history. Features include; Xenon headlights, Led day time running lights,leather interior, BMW Mags, Blue tooth, front and rear PDC, Satellite Controls on the Steering, Climate Control and much more! We take things a little more seriously at CBK Motors we do a full ABC Assessment on all vehicles. A: Body for dents, scratches and scuff marks. B: Overall Mechanical check over and C: Cosmetic and interior assessment for your buying pleasure! E&O

attributes.description:
Barely on the road and the all-new BMW 3 Series Sedan is already leaving everything behind it, including conventions and expectations. Once again the icon displays how to reinvent itself. After all, with the pioneering design language, it stands for the dawning of a new era. Propelling the ultimate sports sedan are even more powerful and efficient engines. And a new force – simply say "Hey BMW" and the all-new BMW 3 Series recognises your voice and heeds your every word.

Balance of 5 year/100 000km Motorplan that can be extended. All vehicles quality checked by our highly qualified BMW technicians, to ensure your vehicle is as good as new. Contact one of our very friendly and highly professional sales staff members to tailor your deal on this vehicle today! Finance can be arranged. Test drives and trade ins welcome!

attributes.description:
It’s bold, unapologetic, and invigorating. This playful hatchback is the sportier member of the iconic Swift family – with its turbocharged engine and powerful 230Nm torque. The Swift Sport boasts highly responsive acceleration, with a choice between a smooth shifting six-speed manual transmission or a brisk accelerating six-speed automatic transmission.

 

With its bold exterior and sporty interior, the Swift Sport is destined to turn heads wherever you go. With all its power and striking looks, you’d better get used to standing out, and stepping up. 

There’s only one way to drive the Swift Sport. You’ve gotta OWN IT!
